name: Nightmare Hunter Clicker
description:
"Nightmare Hunter Clicker" is a narrative RPG and clicker game where players take on the role of a hunter of nightmares. The game is set in a dream world where the player must progress through various levels, each represented by a different nightmare. The player will have to face terrifying monsters and overcome challenging obstacles as they explore the different levels.

Players will have to generate PizzaCoin by battling monsters in each level, which can be used to purchase weapons and skills to aid them in their journey. The player will have a variety of weapons to choose from, each with its own unique abilities, to help them take down the monsters and bosses.

The game also features a minimalist UI, with simple graphics and a focus on text and icons to represent the different elements of the game. The combat mechanics are deep and offer a unique and thrilling experience as players unravel the mysteries of the dream world and hunt down powerful nightmares.

The game offers a unique and exciting gameplay experience, where players must use strategy and skill to defeat the monsters and progress through the levels, all the while uncovering the secrets of the dream world and discovering the true nature of their nightmares.
